title: Mouse Issue
body:
Good evening!

I am currently using a Razer Deathadder and, while I'm not sure if this is an issue with other mice, but currently League of Legends is not recognizing Mouse4 nor Mouse5 button inputs (left thumb buttons). I have tested the button functionality in Windows Explorer, Chrome, and Rocket League and all games recognize the button without issue. What is the root cause of this issue and what is the remedy?

Thank you!

replies.body:
We're still looking into exactly what is causing those specific mouse buttons to have stopped working. I don't have an exact fix, but I've seen quite a few players be able to work around this by using [**X-Mouse Button Control**](https://www.highrez.co.uk/downloads/xmousebuttoncontrol.htm). I also noticed that the Windows Creator Update has stated they've been having the same issues, and now suggest that people running that update revert back to the most stable version of windows. 

That's a little bit a to try, but please let me know if any of that works for you too!!
Thank you for the quick reply! I'll certainly try these work-arounds and let you know how I fair!

Another way to try is to change the mouse 4-5 keys to mimic combinations like ctrl+num5 in synapse (seeing how you use deathadder), this is what i'm currently using
Is there any new information about this problem? It's been some time since the topic, maybe you guys found a way. Any time we can expect a fix?
